item.description:
For anyone wishing to join us for the parade, we will be taking the T into Boston and trying to get a good vantage point for the parade.

We will meet at the Quincy Adams T Station just off route 3 in Quincy.  Meet in the lobby at 830 am.  Bring a small folding chair if you want.  Also a raincoat.....could be showers.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the lobby near the ticket machines

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Bruins Stanley Cup Parade in Boston
